Class TodayEpisode

  • java.lang.Object
    • TodayEpisode

  • public class TodayEpisode
extends java.lang.Object
    This Object holds all Infos about a show in the Countdown XML
    • Show ID
    • Show name
    • Show link
    • Episode link
    • Episode title
    • Season and episode number
    • Air date
    • Relative date
